item.title: Job Market reflection
item.description: This is just a self-reflection of the job market process for tenure-track statistics/biostatistics professorship in North America of the academic year 2024–2025. I am adding more details as I go through the process. I hope this can help other job seekers in the future, especially for the ones coming from Canada and do not have any connections or experiences in the US. Profile Identity I am a Taiwanese-Canadian, and do not have the US passport.
